description: One clinical phenotype, sign, or symptom from the text.

attributes.name: surface_form
attributes.description: Verbatim short phrase for the phenotype (e.g., 'generalized weakness', 'developmental delay')

attributes.name: negated
attributes.description: Whether explicitly negated in text (e.g., 'no seizures', 'without fever')

attributes.name: onset_age_years

attributes.name: hpo_id
attributes.description: HPO ID if explicitly mentioned in text (do not infer)
